name: GOM Inspect Project File
summary: Learn about .GINSPECT_PRJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GOM Inspect projects are often used for analyzing meshes or point clouds stored in .G3D files.

description: Project file created by GOM Inspect, a program used for visualizing and dimensioning 3D models, often those captured by an ATOS optical scanning device; saves 3D objects as well as measurements and analysis reports.
